TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Size3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 用于描述三维对象的大小的数据结构。

span.span: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和通常中不使用 XAML，因为使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 此示例演示如何确定两个结构是否相等使用静态方法。This example shows how to determine if two structures are equal using the static method. 下面的代码演示如何检查结构是否相等。The following code illustrates how to check structures for equality. 结构声明和分配值。The structures are declared and assigned values. 方法然后用于确定两个结构是否相等。The method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Size3DEqualityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#size3dequalityexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和值必须为非负数。The , , and values must be non-negative. 和通常中不使用 XAML，因为使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查两个结构是否相等。The following example shows how to check if two structures are equal. 它还演示如何将值分配给时声明结构和结构声明后的结构。It also shows how to assign values to a structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared.
